name: Power-SM
body:
#power-sm Add-in for SolidWorks ![PowerSM](http://img.ctrlv.in/img/16/04/15/5710ce54885e9.jpg) # Version History: - 04/14/2016: 1.2 release - 01/20/2016: 1.1 release - 01/03/2016: 1.0 release # [Downloads](https://github.com/jliliamen/power-sm/releases) # About: Power-SM ,short for Power-Sheet Metal, is C# COM Add-in for SolidWorks.

The main purpose of this add-in to perform tedious operations Sheet Metal CAD files and let mechancial design engineers focus on the design. Many engineers are faced with cumbersome tasks of modifying hundreds of CAD files especially in mass-manufacturing environment.

The main functionalities will allow users to: - PowerGeometry Tool: Change radius, kfactor and thickness # Notes to developers

You need SolidWorks interop assemblies to build. More information on where to find them here. The recommended solidworks assemblies can be found at this directory (install_dir\api\redist)

# Notes to "hungry" end-users If you are looking to install this add-in on the fly, a installshield windows msi deployer will linked here in the future in the history version section.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
